text: The following were volleyball-related events during 2019 throughout the world. ==Beach volleyball== ===World and continental beach volleyball events=== * June 18–23: 2019 FIVB Beach Volleyball U21 World Championships in Udon ThaniFIVB's 2019 Beach Volleyball U21 World Championships Page ** Winners: (Renato Andrew Lima de Carvalho & Rafael Andrew Lima de Carvalho) (m) / (Victoria Lopes Pereira Tosta & Vitoria De Souza Rodrigues) (f) * June 28 – July 7: 2019 Beach Volleyball World Championships in HamburgFIVB's 2019 Beach Volleyball World Championships Page ** Winners: (Oleg Stoyanovskiy & Viacheslav Krasilnikov) (m) / (Sarah Pavan & Melissa Humana-Paredes) (f) * September 4–8: 2019 FIVB Beach Volleyball World Tour Finals in RomeFIVB's 2019 Beach Volleyball World Tour Finals Page ** Winners: (Oleg Stoyanovskiy & Viacheslav Krasilnikov) (m) / (Laura Ludwig & Margareta Kozuch) (f) * September 18–22: 2019 FIVB Beach Volleyball Olympic Qualification Tournament in HaiyangFIVB's 2019 Beach Volleyball Olympic Qualification Tournament Page ** Men: and both qualified to compete at the 2020 Summer Olympics. Italy and Latvia claim men's Olympic berths in Haiyang ** Women: and both qualified to compete at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Latvia and Spain celebrate berths for Olympics ===2019 FIVB Beach Volleyball
